H0.text: Which Europeans have been proved to have reached North America before Christopher Columbus. Irish Monks

H1.text: Which Europeans have been proved to have reached North America before Christopher Columbus. Portuguese Explorers

H2.text: Which Europeans have been proved to have reached North America before Christopher Columbus. Basque Fishermen

H3.text: Which Europeans have been proved to have reached North America before Christopher Columbus. VIKING

A4.text: Leif Erikson, also known as Leif the Lucky, was a Norse explorer who is thought to have been the first European to set foot on continental America, approximately half a millennium before Christopher Columbus.

A5.text: The Ingstads demonstrated that Norsemen had reached North America about 500 years before Christopher Columbus.
